mapper.select: /* S_BBS_VIDEO_LIST */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , LOWER(A.FILE_EXTENSION) AS FILE_EXTENSION , A.FILE_NAME , B.BBS_BOARD_ID , B.BOARD_NO , C.CATEGORY_NAME , CASE WHEN B.OPEN_YN = '1' THEN '' ELSE '(' || COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang('비공개', 'KO') || ') ' END || B.TITLE AS TITLE FROM COMM_FILE A LEFT JOIN BBS_BOARD B ON (A.GROUP_ID = B.BBS_BOARD_ID AND B.MODULE_CODE = 'ST') LEFT JOIN BBS_SETTING C ON (B.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE A.MODULE_CODE = 'BD' AND COMM_UTIL_PKG.comm_code_attr('FILE_EXTENSION', UPPER(A.FILE_EXTENSION), 'ATTRIBUTE1', #{LANG_CODE}) IN ('VIDEO', 'SUB') ORDER BY B.BBS_BOARD_ID DESC, TO_NUMBER(COMM_UTIL_PKG.comm_code_attr('FILE_EXTENSION', UPPER(A.FILE_EXTENSION), 'SEQ', #{LANG_CODE})) ASC
